name: John Smith
subject: Re: Quick question about revenue ops
body: Thanks for reaching out, but we're not interested at this time. Please remove me from your list.

name: Sarah Johnson
subject: Re: Revenue forecasting
body: This sounds interesting! Can we schedule a call to discuss further? I'm available next Tuesday or Wednesday.

name: Mike Chen
subject: Re: Pipeline visibility
body: We already use Gong and are pretty happy with it. What makes your solution different?

name: Lisa Wang
subject: Re: AI for sales teams
body: Interesting timing - we're currently in the middle of a CRM migration. Maybe reach out next quarter?

name: David Miller
subject: Re: Revenue intelligence
body: Can you send me more info? Specifically looking for case studies and ROI data.

name: Emma Davis
subject: Re: Sales automation
body: How much does this cost? What's the pricing model?

name: Alex Thompson
subject: Re: Pipeline forecasting
body: Before we proceed, I need to know about your security posture. Are you SOC 2 compliant? What about GDPR?
